thread.title: Delta to Require Advance Documentation for Service, Support Animals to Fly

author: Allison Prang
title: Delta to Require Advance Documentation for Service, Support Animals to Fly

organizations.name: delta to require advance documentation for service

text:
Delta Air Lines Inc. is making passengers work a little harder to fly with their animals. 
Facing a surge in bites and urinations from a widening menagerie of species brought into its cabins, Delta said Friday that passengers need to provide more documentation for service and support animals and pledge they will behave.
